p: EPA-rich oil did not alter the percentages of neutrophils or macrophages (M1 and M2) (Fig. 3A), or the concentrations of tumor necrosis factor-α (TNF-α) and macrophage inflammatory protein-2 (MIP-2/CXCL-2) in unwounded skin (data not shown), indicating no disturbance in skin homeostasis. Interleukin-1β (IL-1β), keratinocyte chemoattractant (KC/CXCL-1), interleukin-6 (IL-6) and interleukin-10 (IL-10) concentrations were not detected in unwounded skin (data not shown).
